entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 7:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
